message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of task communication between humans and robots, which is a core issue in the field of robotics (cs.RO). The proposed approach involves using a partially observable Markov decision process (POMDP) to represent the task communication problem, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the importance of designing robots that can interact with non-technical human owners, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). Additionally, the paper presents results from a user experiment, which involves evaluating the performance of the proposed approach, and this falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and control systems (cs.SY).
